title: Color Me Dark: The Diary of Nellie Lee Love, the Great Migration North, Chicago, Illinois, 1919
description: The Diary of Nellie Lee Love, The Great Migration North, Chicago, Illinois, 1919 Key Features Description As Nellie Lee and her family experience many changes during the year 1919, she turns to her diary to record her feelings. The family survives lynchings in middle Tennessee, a move to Chicago, and race riots with dignity and love.
